sources.title: Man from Headquarters
sources.description: A Monogram re-make of the 1935 Monogram movie, The Mystery Man (http://archive.org/details/Mystery_Man_1935) with different actors. A brash newspaper man is framed for murder but manages to expose the real killer and find his dream girl.

sources.title: Man from Headquarters (1942) FRANK ALBERTSON â™£ JOAN WOODBURY
sources.description:
Stars: Frank Albertson, Joan Woodbury, Dick Elliott 
Director: Jean Yarbrough

Reporter Larry Doyle is rewarded for his role in the capture of the Pardoni gang, but then loses his job on a frame-up to keep him from testifying. He goes to a neighboring city, meets Ann and, before he gets another reporting job, has to pawn his engraved revolver with a fence in league with the gangsters also part of Pardoni's mob. The gang gets the revolver from the fence and plant it at their next job, but Larry is on their trail and captures them at the pawn shop.

metadata.Plot: Reporter Larry Doyle is rewarded for his role in the capture of the Pardoni gang, but then loses his job on a frame-up to keep him from testifying. He goes to a neighboring city, meets Ann and, before he gets another reporting job, has to pawn his engraved revolver with a fence in league with the gangsters also part of Pardoni's mob. The gang gets the revolver from the fence and plant it at their next job, but Larry is on their trail and captures them at the pawn shop.
metadata.Writer: John W. Krafft, Edmond Kelso, Rollo Lloyd
metadata.Actors: Frank Albertson, Joan Woodbury, Dick Elliott
